attributes.action: Please Withdraw the troops from Afganistan
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please, Mr Brown. Listen us the people! WE, THE PEOPLE, are wishing you to pull out the troops from Afghanistan. You are not a dictator, you are suppose to be a democratic leader. You are suppose to serve the wishes of the People of the United Kingdom.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
